CustomField.description: Does your Privacy Policy require express consent from a user/patient before the patient's health information is accessed, exchanged, or used, including receiving express consent before a patient's health information is shared or sold (other than disclosures required by law or disclosures necessary in connection with the sale of the application or a similar transaction)?
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Does your Privacy Policy require express consent from a user/patient before the patient's health information is accessed, exchanged, or used, including receiving express consent before a patient's health information is shared or sold (other than disclosures required by law or disclosures necessary in connection with the sale of the application or a similar transaction)?
CustomField.label: Requires express consent?
